attributes.action: STOP BREXIT as its only Advisory not legally binding. Save world Collapase
attributes.additional_details: The enormity of Brexit - the markets, Sterling, Scotland, the Irish border, the Gibraltar border, the frontier at Calais, the need to continue compliance with all EU regulations for a free market, Brits abroad, EU citizens in Britain, the mountain of legistlation to be torn up and rewritten and so much more that it will push Britain into Dark ages first before coming out decades later and we would have lost the world stage by then. Every Empire in history had to work with Allies, we need Allies.
attributes.background: We already chose a PM to make these kind of decisions in national interest in the general election.Given the state of markets and that people were lied to and misled in Leave Vote. The parliament should reject the referendum and arrest the leave campaigners for lying to the British public.
